name: 3mil
tagline: WE PLAN, CREATE AND DELIVER WEBSITES
description:
3mil gives clients the best of both worlds- all of the reliability, creativity and capability of a large agency but with the added personal touch of a small one. We are a small but perfectly formed team with a proactive and dedicated approach. We work with clients to plan, create and deliver highly successful web projects. We also dabble in print and branding too.
At 3mil, we live in the real world and are always implementing realistic ideas within the capabilities of your company and industry. By building relationships with clients, we add a sound understanding of your business to produce cohesive creative projects with the key purpose in mind. We work with clients big and small, around the corner and across the pond. So no matter who you are you will receive the same level of service and dedication. Want to know more? Just give us a call, drop us an email or pop in for a cup of tea.
